name: The Hole In The Mug
description:
The Hole In The Mug

Serve strange breakfast in a strange bar with a strange machine to strange clients with a strange obsession for holes!! Didn't I mentioned that this game is strange???

Controls: WASD to Move, Mouse to control Camera, Left Mouse Button for Interaction.

You have to run a pastry shop and you have take orders from yout customers. But some client can't eat normal food, their food has to be processed in a special machine, the HOLE-O-MATIC 3000,  which let them eat their order. But don't process the orders of normal clients, or they will complain about it. How long you will last???

The game at the moment is in an incomplete and unplayable state, due to an overscope of mine. I apologize for this: the main mechanics of the game is missing from the game, and the things you can do are very limited. Please take this into account when rating the game. I'll probably finish the game after afterwards. I apologize for the current state of the game.
